list_definition.definition: the main circuit board in a computer or other device

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Instructions on how to disassemble the computer and replace the motherboard should be in the Hardware Maintenance Manual.

list_ex_of_english: Thus, after the selection of the motherboard alone the working-memory resource shows a deficit.

Laptop computers generally use highly integrated, miniaturized and customized motherboards.

It is commonly used to bond heatsinks to motherboard chipsets and video card processors where there are no mounting holes to clamp a heatsink down.
